text: Michel Leplay (22 February 1927 – 26 February 2020) was a French Protestant pastor. He was the director of the weekly newspaper Réforme. Leplay was honored with the Amitié judéo-chrétienne de France prize in 2017. Leplay became a pastor at the Reformed Church of France (ERF) in Monoblet, where he stayed for eight years and raised three children with his wife, Laurette. He was President of the Conseil régional d’Île-de-France de l’ERF from 1950 to 1990, and was President of the Commission of Ministers of ERF in 1968. Leplay died on 26 February 2020 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from Normandy Category:People from Le Havre
